text: The Web is a 1947 American crime thriller movie directed by Michael Gordon and starring Ella Raines, Edmond O'Brien, William Bendix, Vincent Price, Maria Palmer, Howland Chamberlain. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 crime movies Category:1947 thriller movies Category:1940s crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Gordon Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: The Web (movie)
